purpose: To create a browser that utilizes AI agents to automate and enhance web browsing tasks.
principle: Integrates AI models like OpenAI and Anthropic to perform intelligent web interactions and automations.
reusability: Designed to be extensible with support for additional AI models and custom agent configurations.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have stability issues and limited feature set compared to established browsers.
name: notte
highlight: An open-source browser leveraging AI agents for enhanced web automation and interaction.
